value.title: Breaking Out Of The Content Clutter: Machine Learning And Artificial Intelligence Offer A Vital Tool For Broadcasters And Streamers
value.excerpt: For streamers and broadcasters looking to break out of the clutter, machine learning models can ... [+] offer a new way to promote or offer additional content.  Wi

value.title: Tesla starts retrofit program for cameras on older vehicles with ‘Full Self-Driving’
value.excerpt: Tesla has launched a retrofit program for Autopilot cameras on older vehicles with the “Full Self-Driving” package. Starting with the introduction of its Autopilot 2.0 suite of sensors in 2016, Tesla started selling all of its cars with the promise that they have all the hardware necessary to achieve full self-driving capability with future software

value.title: Paging the plagiarism police — AI is getting better at writing students’ essays
value.excerpt: Cheating during the pandemic has been rampid and concerns are growing in a climate where automation writing continue to improve.

value.title: New Spiking Neuromorphic Chip Could Usher in an Era of Highly Efficient AI
value.excerpt: Neurons spike in a time sequence, and it's their basis for wiring up into circuits and hierarchies, allowing highly energy-efficient processing.

value.title: AI can help overcome challenges in conventional chips, IBM’s top engineer says
value.excerpt: In an exclusive interview with The Hindu, Christian Jacobi, IBM’s Chief Architect for IBM Z Processor Design, explains the importance of AI-powered computer chips.

value.title: You.com wants to remake the search engine
value.excerpt: The service abandons the linear list of links you’ll find in most general-purpose search engines, opting for a grid of answers organized by source. The sources include generic categories like “web results” and “news” but also specific sites like StackOverflow,

value.title: Four Use Cases For AI Voicebots That Help Improve The Retail Customer Experience
value.excerpt: Let’s take a look at four voice automation use cases that can drive human-centric customer experiences and higher ROI.

value.title: Synthesis AI offers API for virtual humans
value.excerpt: Join gaming leaders online at GamesBeat Summit Next this upcoming November 9-10. Learn more about what comes next.  Synthesis AI, a synthetic data company, has released HumanAPI, a new tool for generating virtual humans from synthetic data.

value.title: Peloton's $495 Guide Camera Uses AI to Help You Strength Train Smarter
value.excerpt: The Peloton Guide uses machine learning and smart camera technology to track your movements, assess your form, and recommend classes focused on muscle groups you need to work.

value.title: 'New World' Population Problems Are Literally Letting AI Enemies Win The Game
value.excerpt: New World has 2,000 players on a server, which was supposed to be enough to sustain a healthy, large-scale PvE and PvP endgame of faction wars and defenses against demon hordes.

value.title: Machine Learning Builds Customer Advocacy Beyond Black Friday Spike
value.excerpt: Savvy CPG leaders this holiday season are firing up customer advocacy with an online referral marketing platform that rewards high-value shoppers and their trusted circles for growth long after Black Friday sales peak.

value.title: Lemonade buys US data science firm to boost car insurance offering
value.excerpt: Israeli-founded, NY-based company makes first acquisition with MetroMile, a San Francisco outfit that leverages AI for personalized insurance policies

value.title: The Evolution Of Voice In Elevating The User Experience
value.excerpt: Voice biometric technology and voice recognition will continue to become more ingrained within the modern digital user experience.

value.title: Why HR Should Pay Attention To The Emergence Of People Analytics And AI
value.excerpt: A key differentiator for successful organizations is how well they manage their talent. As the value of data continues to increase, the opportunity for HR to leverage this data will become more prominent.

value.title: Could Blockchain And AI Help Prevent Deforestation?
value.excerpt: The technology firm iov42 is working with the EU to develop a “blockchain-style” infrastructure system, the aim of which is to leverage blockchain to improve standards of cross-border services for governments and organisations.

value.title: Hyper-personalization and new-age tech will drive AI-enabled banks
value.excerpt: India has witnessed a rapidly growing Big Data Revolution with the integration of AI, ML, IoT into the financial services industry.

value.title: Carbon Robotics Manufactures AI-Powered Weeding Robots
value.excerpt: Concept: Seattle-based agricultural robotics startup Carbon Robotics has developed an autonomous robot that lasers to zap weeds. Integrated with computer vision, the weeders can clear out around 100,000 weeds an hour.

value.title: Everything announced at Nvidia's Fall GTC 2021: Omniverse Avatar, CuQuantum, Clara Holoscan and more
value.excerpt: During the GTC keynote, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang showcased a range of new Nvidia products and initiatives, spanning virtual reality, enterprise AI, cybersecurity, quantum computing, advances in automotive and healthcare and more.

value.title: Nvidia debuts ReOpt to optimize supply chain routing with AI
value.excerpt: Nvidia's new ReOpt service employs AI to help shippers optimize the routing of packages bound for customers' doorsteps.

value.title: Nvidia launches Modulus, a framework for developing ‘physics-grounded’ AI models
value.excerpt: Nvidia's Modulus framework, announced at the company's fall 2021 GTC conference, enables companies to develop 'physics-grounded' AI models.

value.title: Nvidia makes massive language model available to enterprises
value.excerpt: Nvidia has made available one of the world's largest language models -- Megatron 530B -- to enterprise customers.

value.title: Nvidia says its GPU chip is a giant leap forward for computing
value.excerpt: Nvidia estimates that over the past 10 years, the raw computational power of its GPUs has grown by a factor of 1,000.

value.title: Nvidia’s Riva Custom Voice lets companies create custom voices powered by AI
value.excerpt: GTC conference, Nvidia unveiled Riva Custom Voice, a service designed to let customers create AI-powered custom voices.

value.title: Daniel Ek’s fund puts €100M into defence startup Helsing.ai, to support democracies
value.excerpt: Spotify co-founder Daniel Ek pledged 1 billion euros ($1.2 billion) of his personal fortune towards funding deeptech “moonshot projects”, spread across the next 10 years. In particular, he was most interested in boosting European tech and European entrepreneurs as he said

value.title: Soekarno-Hatta Airport readies facial recognition system
value.excerpt: State-owned airport operator PT Angkasa Pura (AP) II (Persero) is creating a facial recognition system with biometric technology for aircraft passengers to process departures at Soekarno-Hatta Airport.
